Terms of Service

Please take a moment to read through our ToS. Unlike others, we make our ToS easily readable and short so please don't just skim through it. We want you to be informed! If its still too long, there is a TLDR in each section.


Since there are people under 18 in our community, expectations on our users are particularly important. We keep our rules nice and simple. Except in extreme cases such as sexual harassment or death threats, we run by a three-strike system. Failure to abide to the rules below after three warnings will result in suspension or ban.

  1. Be respectful of others. We do not tolerate intolerance. Please be civil in your discussions with others and have good faith when debating. On stricter terms, do not insult others or discriminate against race, gender, etc... Do not engage in hate speech or threat to harm others. Do not endorsed the Nazis, the KKK, or any similar group. Genocide apologia is not allow here. Similarly, saying that a certain group "deserved to suffer" through oppression is also not allowed. Do not glorify violence, self-harm, suicide, or animal abuse.

  2. No explicit content. Since our users are quite young, don't post any sexual content (e.g., nudity). Sharing or attempting to share content that sexualised children or normalised child sexual abuse will result in an instant ban. Sharing real media showing explicit excessive violence with the intention to harass or disgust people will also result in an instant ban.

  3. We are here for reading. Do not use your account for spamming or to scam others. Doing so would result in a ban. We are here for reading, so don't just come here to post advertisements. Do not come to our platform to spread misinformation. If you try to spread misinformation (e.g., climate change denial, flat earth, anti-vaccines), you will be warned.

  4. Do not come with malicious intent. Do not use OBB with malicious intent. In other words, do not attempt to scam or hack us and do not use this site for illegal activities - you must follow the law. This rule also includes - do not blackmail people or threaten to leak private information or attempt to impersonate somebody on OBB.

TLDR: Don't be a jerk and use the site appropriately. Remember there are children here!

A few disclaimers about privacy, especially for the younger folks here.

  1. Data or information that is collected: Your first name, your email address, your book interests, your age bracket, and (possibly) your address / local area is required when you sign up. No other information about you is being collected.

  2. Your information isn't being shared. We do not share your personal information. We do not use an AI algorithm for recommendations, instead we rely mainly on filters, so your information is not used by OBB for AI training purposes (because we don't have an AI).

  3. We use your data / information to benefit your experience. We use your information to ensure that you are recommendations are suited to you.

TLDR: The data we collect on you will not be shared and will only be use to give you the best recommendations.
